data.title: International College Portsmouth
data.meta_description: Learn more about foundation and pathway courses available to you as an international student at the University of Portsmouth, offered at our associate college
data.text:
Founded in 2009, International College Portsmouth (ICP) offers multiple pathways to a broad range of University of Portsmouth degrees in an environment that encourages you to achieve excellence in your studies.

ICP is part of the global Navitas Group, an internationally recognised education provider with the knowledge and resources of staff in more than 120 colleges and campuses worldwide. You'll be based in the heart of our city centre campus, close by to all the facilities and buildings you'll be using when you join us for your degree.

You can choose to start in September, January or June.
